Class UpdateRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongodb.bulk.WriteRequest
      • com.mongodb.bulk.UpdateRequest

  • public final class UpdateRequest
extends WriteRequest
    An update to one or more documents.
    Since:
    3.0

        public boolean isUpsert()
